taxonConcepts.nameAccordingTo: Species 2000 & ITIS Catalogue of Life: April 2013

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Inhabits lakes and rarely enters rivers (Ref. 7335).  Feeds on small fish, snails, insect larvae, worms and other bottom-dwelling organisms (Ref. 44091).  Females tend clutch of eggs (Ref. 2060).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Central America:  Atlantic slope of Nicaragua, in Lakes Nicaragua and Managua.
dataObjects.references: Kullander, S.O. 2003 Cichlidae (Cichlids). p. 605-654. In R.E. Reis, S.O. Kullander and C.J. Ferraris, Jr. (eds.) Checklist of the Freshwater Fishes of South and Central America. Porto Alegre: EDIPUCRS, Brasil. (Ref. 36377)

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Atlantic slope of Nicaragua, in lakes Nicaragua and Managua; introduced in Hawaii.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Size
dataObjects.title: Max. size

dataObjects.title: File:Amphilophus labiatum, weiblich.jpg
dataObjects.description: English: 1= Amphilophus labiatum, female, in aquarium  German: 1= Amphilophus labiatum, weiblich, im Aquarium

dataObjects.title: File:Amphilophus labiatum, yawning in aquarium.jpg
dataObjects.description: English: 1=Amphilophus labiatum, yawning in aquarium. Wrong colors due to bad lighting, the real colour is salmon with some red sprinkles in the fin (like this photo)  German: 1=Amphilophus labiatum, gähnend im Aquarium, die Farben sind leider durch die Beleuchtung falsch dargestellt. Er ist lachsfarben mit roten Sprenkeln in den Flossen (ähnlich der in diesem Foto).
